overview:
Advance Hydrau-Tech Pvt. Ltd. of Subha Group, a forerunner in the field of manufacturing/designing latest state of the art including microprocessor controlled scrap processing machines for all types of scraps.

They pioneered the technology of manufacturing the largest range of Scrap Processing Machines under a single roof.

Even after 32 years of experience the motto at ‘ADVANCE’ has always been and still is to upgrade the technology to suit the changing environment of the Industry.

The current manufacturing range includes : i) Ferrous and Non-Ferrous Scrap Balers in various Models and specifications including Fully Automatic PLC Controlled Balers. ii) Scrap Shredders iii) Turning Crushers iv) Scrap Shears Hydraulic/Mechanical v) Briquetting Machines for Swarf, Chips and Shavings vi) Box Shear vii) Shear Baler viii) Car Baler ix) Continuous Baler X Vertical and Horizontal Balers for Paper, Plastic, COrrugated Boxes, Fabric Waste etc. ‘ADVANCE’ has sold and installed more than 4,500 machines in India and in various countries. ‘ADVANCE’ has also completed prestigious special assignments like developing Special Purpose Machines(SPM’s) for the Indian Railways, Indian Navy, Cattle Feed Compactors and for various other industrial applications.

video_embeds.description: Baling Machine Jumbo Turnout Auto comes with Hopper is highly used to compact waste materials for ease of handling and can utilised it for other recycled purpose. Contact us for more info : info@ahtpl.in / netmart@ahtpl.in Tel : 91-11-47571100-99 Mob. :
